thread.title: Mum discovers her fiance was ‘having an affair’ with her best mate after they sent her a shocking video of them together
thread.title_full: Mum discovers her fiance was ‘having an affair’ with her best mate after they sent her a shocking video of them together

author: hrichardson
title: Mum discovers her fiance was ‘having an affair’ with her best mate after they sent her a shocking video of them together
text:
Mrs Crunch 'He said their kids would be better looking than our daughter' Mum discovers her fiance was ‘having an affair’ with her best mate after they sent her a shocking video of them together 
Roxanne Bamber-Wilson, 19, was heartbroken after the father of her child allegedly taunted her with cruel footage saying the sex was 'way better' with her friend Exclusive
